channel.title: Adverts
channel.description:
I'm starting to get worried about the subject matter of the forum. If the adverts are targeted at us by information on the page, and this page happens to be StarBlaster100's birthday topic. It just seems quite strange.
[IMG]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c219/slurpiebrain/Website.png[/img]

item.title: Adverts
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Omfg… Just stop. Now, please, all of you. I’m done. It’s over. The topic is done. I was merely pointing out the irony in the advert in StarBlaster’s birthday topic. But obviously no one takes any time to actually read a topic before they post. Just lock it, or delete it.

Read full topic

item.title: Adverts
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

ZeroFreeze:

You can’t right click block flash ads though

There’s a little button on the top right of all Flash/Java Applets/SilverLight etc that says ‘Block’. I think Adblock Plus just looks for and tags, then sticks a button wherever they may be. Srsly, Adblock Plus is Win. It’s not like I’m ever going to click on the ads (which tend to be “FREE RS2 GEEPEES”)…so it’s not hurting anybody.

Read full topic

item.title: Adverts
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:10, topic:184189”][quote author=ZeroFreeze link=topic=245872.msg2074795#msg2074795 date=1203951639]

Who cares?
Use Adblock plus

Won’t work if it’s a flash ad.
[/quote]

Lol, yes it will. An ad is made up of javascript. So, the browser simply doesn’t parse or display that javascript.

Oh, and this website doesn’t have flash ads, it uses google adsense which just displays a picture as a link.[/quote]
You can’t right click block flash ads though

Read full topic

item.title: Adverts
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I don’t and never expect to use flash ads (which by the way adsense will block if you tell it to) I simply use google adsense and plan to stick with that.

Read full topic

item.title: Adverts

item.description:

Who cares?
Use Adblock plus
[/quote]
Won’t work if it’s a flash ad.[/quote]

Lol, yes it will. An ad is made up of javascript. So, the browser simply doesn’t parse or display that javascript.

Oh, and this website doesn’t have flash ads, it uses google adsense which just displays a picture as a link.

item.description:

Watch the advert through. I complained about it once, but uh, I had an “out” to show that I might not be a retarded complaining bitch! Better get stoned as fuck, because you have no excuse right now.

dude, it was fun as fuck that night,

its a gamesomething advertisement

Shut up Dragonus, you’re banned. EPHASION!@!!!#@@@#!@!!#@@!$!
[/quote]
proof?[/quote]
You even said in #l0l, and your hostname was the same as it was on Dragonus.

item.title: Adverts
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Silver Lining:

Watch the advert through. I complained about it once, but uh, I had an “out” to show that I might not be a retarded complaining bitch! Better get stoned as fuck, because you have no excuse right now.

I know, it’s Gametap, and it’s a flash ad, or something of the sort, which means it isn’t actually influenced by text on the page. I just thought I should bring it up, because of the irony.

Read full topic
